label: Dark Energy Evolution Parameter w_a
wl_code: With[{b3=24}, waLinear = -1/Sqrt[b3]; wa = waLinear * 4; desi_wa = -0.99; sigma = (wa - desi_wa)/0.32; {N[wa,4], N[sigma,2]}]
note: THAWING MODEL: w_a = -4/sqrt(b3) = -0.816 (4-form projection). DESI 2025: wa = -0.99 +/- 0.32. Deviation: 0.54 sigma (within 1 sigma). The 4-form projection (dim=4) converts raw G2 holonomy wa_linear=-0.204 to observable wa=-0.816
mathematical_goal: Derive w_a from G2 geometry with 4-form projection, matching DESI 2025 thawing quintessence
theoretical_significance: In the Thawing Model, dark energy evolves via G2 Ricci flow relaxation. The raw holonomy constraint wa_linear = -1/sqrt(b3) = -0.204 represents the intrinsic 3-form contribution. Observables in 4D spacetime project through the co-associative 4-form (dimension 4), giving wa_projected = wa_linear x 4 = -0.816. This provides a geometric interpretation consistent with the DESI-observed thawing signature.

geometry.fundamental_constant: b3 = 24 (third Betti number of TCS G2)
geometry.physical_interpretation: Thawing quintessence from G2 Ricci flow relaxation
